intension: Create a Facebook advertisement for a modern glass house that is just listed for sale. The ad should showcase the facade and location of the house, and provide information about the property including a website address and a limited time offer of 10% off all kinds of property from DEC 22 to FEB 21. The website address is www.ignace.uk.
globalcaption: The image features a large, modern glass building with many windows. The building is situated in a city, and it appears to be a skyscraper. The windows are reflecting the sky, creating a visually appealing scene. The building is the main focus of the image, and it is surrounded by other buildings in the background.
keywords: architecture, building, country, district, facade, home, house, mansion, modern, property, real estate, residence, street scene, town, glass, facebook, ad, fb, advertisement, sale, just listed

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a white and blue composition featuring a blue background with a white square in the center. The white square is slightly larger than the blue background, creating a contrast between the two colors. The blue background covers the majority of the image, while the white square stands out as the focal point

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a tall, modern building with many windows. The building is made of glass, giving it a sleek and contemporary appearance. The windows are arranged in a pattern, with some windows being larger than others. The building is situated in a city, and the sky can be seen through the windows, creating a visually appealing scene
